name: Google - Hide the "Did you mean" suggestion
description: This user style hides the Did you mean suggestion that may appear at the top of a search results page when Google thinks you misspelled your search keywords.
additional_info: As an alternative to displaying the Did you mean suggestion, Google may automatically display search results for keywords it thinks you intended to enter, not the keywords you did enter. This alternative behavior can be prevented by the following user script: Disable Google Automatic Spelling Correction
